header_text: You are in an important meeting and you need to pay attention. Halfway through the meeting you realize you have been zoning out and don't know what is going on. You think something must be wrong with you.

elements.Text: Is your zoning out a sign of something wrong with your brain?

elements.name: You are in an important meeting and you need to pay attention. Halfway through the meeting you realize you have been zoning out and don't know what is going on. You think something must be wrong with you._Mental Health_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
